EmailTemplate.description: Uniform shop closed half term break 2015
EmailTemplate.name: Uniform shop closed half term break 2015
EmailTemplate.subject: Uniform shop closed half term break 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear Parents,
We would like to inform you that the uniform shop at both Krylatskaya and Rosinka campuses will be closed during the half term break, 23 - 27 February 2015.
Both shops will open again on Monday 2nd March, operating with normal hours, from 8:30am - 4:30pm.
Thank you.
Kind Regards,
Administration Team The International School of Moscow World Class Education
